Articles.Content:
Do you want something but can't find where to get it?

Fear not!We will help you find it!

Just make a specified request about what you want us to find and well use our Internet search powers to help you!

If you are happy with a response, you can pay back by giving rep.

Ill start:

I am looking for a cheap PPC(aka PDA) because I am very nostalgic.

It must support Windows Mobile(the old one, not the new Windows 8 lookalike),

so I can pop a memory card and transfer and read files. It must include a charger only if it doesn't charge/connect through a micro-USB cable(I already have one).

It must be under 50$(USD). Must be in working order and the screen must be intact.

Must have a battery. If possible, I would like to buy it in my country(Latvia).

The website index in Latvia is .lv Most websites have English language available.

Otherwise use Google Chrome to translate the pages.

I personally used to have an HTC PPC which even had a slide-out keyboard.

Happy hunting!

Edited August 17, 2014 by SpaceXray
